title: Green Gardens Team Beta Lunch Coordination
description: Welcome to our eco-friendly lunch coordination! Our team coordinator will gather everyone's meal preferences to ensure a delicious and sustainable catering experience for Team Beta.

pages.name: team_details
pages.title: Team Coordination Details
pages.description: Let's organize our Green Gardens team lunch perfectly

elements.name: coordinator_name
elements.title: Team Coordinator
elements.description: Name of the person organizing this lunch order

elements.name: team_name
elements.title: Team/Division Name
elements.description: Your team or division within Green Gardens

elements.name: event_date
elements.title: Lunch Event Date
elements.description: When is this catered lunch taking place?

elements.name: delivery_location
elements.title: Delivery Address/Location
elements.placeholder: Building name, floor, conference room, etc.

pages.name: attendance
pages.title: Team Attendance & Dietary Needs
pages.description: Help us prepare the right amount of delicious food

elements.name: total_attendees
elements.title: Total Team Members Attending
elements.description: How many people from your team will be eating?

elements.name: dietary_restrictions_count
elements.title: Special Dietary Requirements
elements.description: Number of people with dietary restrictions or preferences

elements.name: dietary_restrictions_details
elements.title: Dietary Details & Allergies
elements.description: Please specify dietary restrictions, allergies, or preferences (vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, etc.)
elements.placeholder: e.g., 3 vegetarians, 1 person with nut allergy, 2 gluten-free requests

pages.name: main_courses
pages.title: Sandwich & Main Course Selection
pages.description: Select the perfect sandwiches for your Green Gardens team

elements.name: sandwich_quantities
elements.title: Sandwich Order Quantities
elements.description: Enter how many of each sandwich your team members would like

elements.name: preferred_bread
elements.title: Team's Preferred Bread Choice
elements.description: What type of bread works best for most of your team?

pages.name: sides_drinks
pages.title: Sides & Refreshments
pages.description: Complete your team's meal with snacks and beverages

elements.name: chips_quantities
elements.title: Snacks & Chips Selection
elements.description: Choose snacks for your team members

elements.name: beverage_quantities
elements.title: Beverage Coordination
elements.description: What drinks should we provide for the team?

elements.name: dessert_quantities
elements.title: Dessert Selection
elements.description: End the meal on a sweet note

elements.name: condiment_packets
elements.title: Condiments & Extras
elements.description: Do you need individual condiment packets?

elements.name: special_requests
elements.title: Special Coordination Notes
elements.description: Any special setup requirements, timing needs, or additional requests for the caterer?
elements.placeholder: e.g., Please use biodegradable plates, setup in the main conference room, need extra napkins, arrival instructions, etc.

elements.name: contact_phone
elements.title: Coordinator Contact Number
elements.description: Best phone number for delivery coordination

completedHtml:
🌿 Team Beta Order Successfully Submitted!

Thank you for coordinating Green Gardens Team Beta's sustainable lunch experience!

Your thoughtfully planned catering request is now being processed. Our eco-conscious caterer will reach out to confirm all details and coordinate the perfect delivery time for your team.

🆔 Order Reference: BETA-{submitId}

🌱 Thank you for choosing sustainable catering options!
